title: "Example R Markdown drake file target"
author: Will Landau and Kirill MÃ¼ller
output: pdf_document

Run `make.R` to generate the output `report.pdf` and its dependencies. Because we use `loadd()` and `readd()` below, `drake` knows `report.pdf` depends on targets `raw_data`, `fit`, and `hist`.

```{r content}
library(drake)
loadd(raw_data, fit)
print(head(raw_data))
print(fit)
readd(hist)
```
